name: Checkbox
description: Checkbox component for toggling boolean value related to some context

props.name: value
props.description: The Checkbox value. If true the switch will be turned on. Default value is false

props.name: onValueChange
props.description: Callback function for value change event

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether the checkbox should be disabled

props.name: size
props.description: The Checkbox size, affect both width and height

props.name: selectedIcon
props.description: The icon asset to use for the selected indication

props.name: label
props.description: Add a label to the Checkbox

props.name: labelProps
props.description: Props to pass on to the label component

props.name: containerStyle
props.description: Custom styling for the checkbox and label container
